meanings.definition: Very small or tiny in size.
meanings.sent1: The teentsy kitten fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: I found a teentsy pebble on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The teentsy bug tried to climb a blade of grass.
meanings.sent4: Her teentsy voice was barely audible in the noisy room.
meanings.sent5: The teentsy flower bloomed in the crack of the sidewalk.

meanings.sent1: She added just a teentsy bit of sugar to her tea.
meanings.sent2: There's only a teentsy amount of milk left in the bottle.
meanings.sent3: He asked for a teentsy favor that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The teentsy donation made a big difference to the charity.
meanings.sent5: I felt a teentsy of excitement when I saw the surprise.
